text: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ

translation.en.sahih: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.
translation.id.indonesian: Apabila mereka dilemparkan ke dalamnya mereka mendengar suara neraka yang mengerikan, sedang neraka itu menggelegak,
